name: HSP_BFH_ACT_DATA
description: Actions performed during the billing activity.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores what actions were actually performed on the account.
entries: Change Next Payment Plan Auto Pay Date
Send In Basket Message for DBC
Change Next Visit Auto Pay Date
Override Send DBC to Grouper Checks
Mark for Separate Service Area Billing
Unmark for Separate Service Area Billing
Process Visit Auto Pay Payment Now
Send Self-Pay to Consolidated Service Area / External Billing
Return from Consolidated Service Area / External Billing
Initiate Home Health Notice of Admission

columns.name: ACTION_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the resultant hospital account note record from this activity.

columns.name: ACTION_COMMENT
columns.description: The user entered comment for the action.

columns.name: ACTION_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user-entered agency for the action.

columns.name: ACTION_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: ACTION_PROC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user entered procedure for the action.

columns.name: ACTION_DATE
columns.description: The user entered date for the action.

columns.name: ACTION_ASGN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The agency assign reason category number that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACTION_WD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The agency withdraw reason category number that is set as a result of this action.

columns.name: ACTION_PAPRLS_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason the paperless billing status was changed for the associated action

columns.name: ACTION_TX_ID
columns.description: Stores the associated transaction created as a result of a billing activity action.

columns.name: ACTION_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores an amount associated with a performed billing activity action.

columns.name: ACT_NOT_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: Stores a not allowed amount associated with a performed billing activity action.

columns.name: ACCT_RMV_FROM_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: Stores the financial assistance tracker from which the hospital account is removed as part of the billing action.

columns.name: ACCT_ADD_TO_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: Stores the financial assistance tracker to which the hospital account is added as part of the billing action.

columns.name: ACTION_LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The location that this action set for the account.

columns.name: ACT_RELATED_HAR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The related account type this action changed the account to.

columns.name: ACTION_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: Stores the admit date set through a billing activity action.

columns.name: ACTION_DISCHRG_DATE
columns.description: Stores the discharge date set through a billing activity action.

columns.name: ACT_RELATED_HAR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the related hospital account created through the Create Related Account billing action.

columns.name: ACT_COMB_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for a hospital account that was combined or uncombined through a billing activity action.

columns.name: ACT_COMBINE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the reason that an account was combined
entries: System combine due to contact move
System combine - recurring series split no longer needed
System combine - replaced voided Hospital Account

columns.name: COMM_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description: History of the communication mode used in an account activity.

columns.name: ACT_HH_DISCHRG_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the patient status (I CLM 1021) value entered for the Override Home Health Discharge Disposition action in an account activity.

columns.name: ACTION_ACCT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The account class this action changed the account to.

columns.name: ACTION_START_DATE
columns.description: History of start date used in a date range of an action.

columns.name: ACTION_END_DATE
columns.description: History of end date used in a date range of an action.

columns.name: ACT_CODABS_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The Coding or Abstracting status change made by the action.

columns.name: ACT_CDI_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status change made by the action.

columns.name: ACT_CHNG_STAT_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the change made by the action.

columns.name: ACT_ASGN_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the Coding, Abstracting, or Clinical Documentation Improvement user assignment made by the action.

columns.name: ACT_ASGN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ACTION_DAY_OF_MONTH
columns.description: The day of month that was selected when the action was performed.

columns.name: ACTION_CARD_ID
columns.description: The payment method that was selected when the action was performed.

columns.name: ACT_BILL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates how the account was billed. (Date Range, Cumulative, Part A Final)

columns.name: ACT_CONTEST_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Shows why the account was contested.

columns.name: ACT_CONTEST_RESOLUTION_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Holds why the account's contested status was resolved.

columns.name: ACTION_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the new coverage for the Professional Billing Next Responsible Party (PB NRP) action and the unique identifier for the current coverage for the PB Transfer to Insurance action.

columns.name: ACTION_NAA_WRITE_OFF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the code that is used to write-off not allowed amount.

columns.name: ACTION_BASE_AMOUNT
columns.description: This item stores the base amount set through by a billing activity (ATM) action (for actions with a second, calculated amount).

columns.name: ACTION_PERCENT
columns.description: This item stores the percent used by a billing activity (ATM) action.

columns.name: ACT_LATE_CHG_OPTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The late charge processing type that was performed on an account

columns.name: ACTION_NUM_OF_PMTS
columns.description: The number of payments entered into the billing activity.

columns.name: ACTION_STMT_DAY_OF_MONTH
columns.description: The statement day of the month entered into the billing activity.

columns.name: ACT_ACCT_MAN_SPLIT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The manual split account reason that a billing action set for the account.

columns.name: ACTION_RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: The study associated with this action.

columns.name: ACTION_NUM_OF_CHGS
columns.description: The number of charges associated with the action.

columns.name: ACTION_SP_DSCNT_OV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the billing follow-up history item for tracking the self-pay discount override reason if the account is not insured.

columns.name: ACTION_SP_DSNT_IOV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the billing follow-up history item for tracking the self-pay discount override reason if the account is insured.

columns.name: ACT_WRITE_OFF_BALANCE_YN
columns.description: Whether to write off the entire balance

columns.name: ACT_REFERENCE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the reference number

columns.name: ACTION_EMAIL
columns.description: Stores the email from the activity when the notification was sent.

columns.name: ACTION_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the phone number from the activity when the notification was sent.

columns.name: ACT_DATE_FLTR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item describes how the start and end dates were interpreted when filtering transactions on a detail bill.

columns.name: ACTION_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The statement or detail bill ID created by the action. For example, for Send Statement this is the statement that was printed. For Send Detail Bill, this is the detail bill that was printed. If the user chooses to print later, then this will be blank until the statement/detail bill run is accepted. This may never be set if the statement/detail bill is removed from the queue before it is printed.

columns.name: ACT_SELF_PAY_EXEMPT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The self-pay charge exemption reason category ID for the hospital account.

columns.name: ACT_CONS_SP_WITHDRAWAL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The consolidated self-pay account withdrawal reason that is set as the result of this action.
entries: Sent to PB bad debt in non-SBO AR Service Area.
